titleStmt.title: A discourse of the use of images in relation to the Church of England and the Church of Rome in vindication of Nubes testium against a pamphlet entitled The antiquity of the Protestant religion concerning images, directed against some leaves of that collection.
titleStmt.author: Gother, John, d. 1704.

notesStmt.note: Written by John Gother. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
